scripts.setup: npm i && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run dev
scripts.dev_docker: concurrently "npm run server --prefix server -- ${S_PORT}" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.start_docker: C_PORT=${C_PORT:-10999} S_PORT=${S_PORT:-10998} npm run setup && npm run dev_docker
